remarks: The set of all functions from topology ` J ` to topology ` K ` that are continuous at a point ` P ` .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
statement:
cnpval $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) /\ P e. X ) -> ( ( J CnP K ) ` P ) = { f e. ( Y ^m X ) | A. y e. K ( ( f ` P ) e. y -> E. x e. J ( P e. x /\ ( f " x ) C_ y ) ) } ) $.
$d J f x y $.
$d K f x y $.
$d P f x y $.
$d X f x y $.
$d Y f x y $.
$d f x y $.
